forgot_password_sub: Enter your email to reset password
choose_photo: Choose a photo from your gallery that you want to caption.
briefly_describe: Briefly describe your image to get relevant captions.
pick_style: Pick a style like Funny, Romantic, or Cool to match your mood.
generate_caption: Tap the button and get a caption + hashtags instantly!
save_or_share: You can favorite captions, copy them, or share with friends.
free_plan_desc: Includes 50 tokens and access to all basic features with ads (2 per request). Great to explore the app for free.
ad_free_addon_desc: Remove all ads from the app. Combine with any token plan for an uninterrupted experience.
starter_plan_desc: Get 100 tokens for casual use. Ads will be shown with each request.
standard_plan_desc: Includes 200 tokens with ads. Ideal for regular users.
pro_plan_desc: 500 tokens for heavy usage with ads. Great for creators and small teams.
ultra_pro_plan_desc: 1000 tokens with ads. Best value for power users and businesses.
copied_success_desc: Feel free to paste it wherever you need.
something_went_wrong: Something went wrong! Please try after sometimes
token_zero_desc: Please contact support or admin to recharge
password_required: Password must be at least 6 characters
save_favorite_desc: Save your favorite captions here to find them easily later.
new_version_available: A new version of the app is available. Please update to continue.
file_permission_required: File permission is required to access the gallery. Please enable it in your device settings.
try_again_later: Try again in a few seconds.
